channel.title: How to change wielding level on 508?
channel.description: I'm experiencing technical difficulties on Scaperune source. A player is level 99 on attack but still cannot wield due to the fact that it asks to be level 70 to wield the weapon, so I'm confused. Any experts on the subject? Much appreciated.

item.title: How to change wielding level on 508?
item.dc:creator: @rigorous rigorous
item.description:
@rigorous wrote:

on the items you have

weid = (level)

instead of

weild =< level

Read full topic
item.source: How to change wielding level on 508?
